I empathise with you and I am glad that you are openly talking about your feelings (as this is the first step for you to come out of this phase - so congratulations, you have taken the first step towards the recovery and you should feel happy about it).

**Here is what I would suggest you to try:**

1) Talk to your mentor about this. Share what you are going through with him/her (**mentor should be able guide you**)  
2) **Meditate everyday** (if possible in the morning)  
3) Start penning your thoughts in a personal diary (just let your feelings come out on the paper) - **This can be a game changer for introverts**.  
4) Try to help others - doesn't matter how small it is (lending a pen, donating few bucks to poor kids, visiting an orphanage and donating old clothes or food, just do it. **When you help someone, it boosts your self-confidence - this is tried and tested infinite times.**
